plot: I AM THE TIGER is a one-woman show that uses dance, music and poetry to tell the story of an endangered species. Two essential aspects of life on our planet are in danger; feminine energy ...
title: I Am the Tiger
plot_es: I AM THE TIGER is a one-woman show that uses dance, music and poetry to tell the story of an endangered species. Two essential aspects of life on our planet are in danger; feminine energy ...
